example.eg: The introduction of printing came late in the history of writing, and it is a surprise that it wasn't invented earlier.
example.egtrans: 在文字史的长河中，印刷技术问世颇晚，没有早些被发明，真是让人惊讶。

example.eg: The host made introductions, and soon everyone was chatting.
example.egtrans: 主人介绍了各位客人认识，很快，大家都聊起天来。

example.eg: In the introduction, the author thanked his family and his mentors for helping him.
example.egtrans: 作者在序言中感谢家人和导师对自己的帮助。

example.eg: Dan changed majors because he failed an introduction to economics class in his first year.
What caused the reaction was the introduction of oxygen into the chemical mixture.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 引进, 引入, 放入

example.eg: The introduction of the paper didn't really make sense.
Jon arrived at his interview with nothing but a letter of introduction from his teacher who used to work there.
The piano played a quick introduction before the orchestra came in.
The introduction of a lot of foreign wildlife has had a big impact on Australia.
